name: ordamo-v3-sdk-demo-app
description: A demo application that uses the ordamo-v3-sdk package. This can be used as a template for new Ordamo V3 apps.

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build-content && npm run start:dirty
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-content && npm run build:dirty
scripts.release: npm test && rimraf release && brunch build --production && ordamo-v3-sdk build-content app release
